title: At Bakhmut direction Russian army shelled Bohdanivka, Kalynivka, Klischiyivka and Chasiv Yar of Donetsk region. Russian aviat...
content: At Bakhmut direction Russian army shelled Bohdanivka, Kalynivka, Klischiyivka and Chasiv Yar of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Novomarkove, Chasiv Yar, Pivdenne of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
